summary: Replace the Azura statue by a more sexier one.
descriptionHtml:
Don't you think the vanilla Azura statue is ugly ? This is my own interpretation of the goddess.

This mod replace the vanilla statue of Azura by another one more sexier, with a new face and custom texture.

Absolutely useless, so essential !

To install use Nexus mod Manager and follow instruction. No esp, just a nif file.

See Also:

[URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55293/?/]Polished and Sexy Nocturnal statue[/URL]

Enjoy !
author: Nikitaa
